name: Flying Monkey - Twine
description:
Flying Monkey

is set in an alternative (or not?) future where mutations were normal to the past generations but have now been stabilized and so, every mutant being is in a museum. Your character is Monka, one of the last flying monkeys on Earth. You’re currently on display at the ‘mutant animals’ wing of a museum which honestly, has a bit of everything. Even has its own ‘fences’ wing. Yes, a room just with fences. It’s a fun museum.
